articles.title: Three new gecko species discovered after eight years of searching - Earth.com
articles.description: Three new species of day geckos have been discovered, a finding that highlights their unique biodiversity and value for conservation.
articles.content:
A tan-brown lizard dashed across sun-warmed rock in coastal Angola and ran straight into the scientific record. It belonged to a trio of day geckos that science had never formally described.
